title: Constructing asymmetric dual active sites through symbiotic effect for achieving efficient and selective photoreduction of CO2 to C2H4
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,5060-5069
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01376J, Paper
Yong Xu, Ping Wang, Man Zhang, Weili Dai, Yuxuan Xu, Jian-Ping Zou, Xubiao Luo
Asymmetric dual active sites are constructed through symbiotic effect. Owing to the differences in electron density, adsorption capacity and dipoleâ€“dipole repulsion, the energy barriers are reduced, leading to selective C2H4 production.
